comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: What do you suppose is the pointy object in his left hand? Also, some of the photos, like this one, have marks on the emulsion indicating that they have shifted in their cases and are being displayed crooked.  Do the LOC curators try to restore them correctly in their cases?

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Artolog: We can't tell what he is holding, perhaps a knife. The photographer hand-tinted this object. At the present time, we are not adjusting the mats and most do stay in place. Some have been replaced over the years.
